name: Vampires of Glory - Halloween blood diaries of the haunted academy games
name_original: Vampires of Glory - Halloween blood diaries of the haunted academy games
description:
The Vampires of Glory have arrived! Help them rule the night by matching and collecting the blood gems, hearts, and souls of their victims!

▶ Find big matches to create explosive combos!
▶ Spectacular special effects!
▶ 500+ addicting levels!
▶ Earn free boosters and bonuses!
▶ Challenge friends on Game Center!

Download now before the Sun rises!!
